message: Let's be fair and split it 60/40, I'll take the bigger share this time. We can alternate in future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need a larger share to justify rejecting your last offer.  Let's split it 55/45.
Getting closer, meet me in the middle
Let's call it even. 50/50 split.  No more haggling, it's time to agree.
